description.value:
A substance found on the beds of dormant tar pits, used by shamans in healing poultices, or diluted in hot water to make a foul-tasting drink that reduces fevers. Provides +10 to Medicae Tests when treating diseases and fevers, can be used to stop Blood Loss as a Full Action.

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 45 T

system.effect:
A substance found on the beds of dormant tar pits, used by shamans in healing poultices, or diluted in hot water to make a foul-tasting drink that reduces fevers.
Provides +10 to Medicae Tests when treating diseases and fevers, can be used to stop Blood Loss as a Full Action.
